text: 8.24 2 Ko 7.13-14, 8.1-7 Anɨb ak bɨ omɨŋal nokom pi ak amjakel, kɨlop mapen yɨbɨl lɨl dɨtep gɨnɨmɨb. Anɨgem nɨm, takaw yad apin ak, bɨ omɨŋal nokom kɨli Pol ne nɨŋɨd agup agɨl nɨgɨnɨgabal. Takaw anɨb ak anɨb apin, Kolin binɨb Klays yɨl mɨdebal okok, kɨli pel gɨtep gel yɨp tep gup apin. Pen Klays binɨb ne pelpel apnan gɨpal okok abe, Pol ne nɨŋɨd agup agɨl nɨgɨnɨgabal.
